description: Develops expertise in server side engineering

signals: Ensures quality, performance, monitoring, alerting and security using best practices
Proficiency to code in most domain-relevant languages and understanding of their development, inspection, logging and testing stack (dropped OOP to make more generic and inclusive)
Deep understanding of service-oriented and microservices architectural patterns, troubleshooting methods and best practices
examples: Drives best practices in reliability management (resiliency, autoscaling, monitoring, alerting, stability, performance)

signals: Deep understanding of cloud environment, CI/CD, testing, validation
Works across teams to recommend solutions to identified gaps  --> Able to find technical solutions for Tribe level problems
examples: Guides teams and fosters a culture to create an architecture that scales
Promotes and guides initiatives to improve the system

signals: Proactively ensures the highest levels of systems and infrastructure availability across the group
examples: Provides technology solutions to support business/product teams in solving complex use case scenarios

signals: Defines and evolves architecture of the system as a whole
